controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Define and manage allowed and prohibited system account types, including creation, modification, and removal according to policies.

criteria.description: Define and manage allowed and prohibited system account types, including creation, modification, and removal according to policies.

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to CUI and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies.

criteria.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to CUI and system resources in accordance with applicable access control policies.

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI within the system and between connected systems.

criteria.description: Enforce approved authorizations for controlling the flow of CUI within the system and between connected systems.

controls.name: Separation of Duties
controls.description: Identify the duties of individuals requiring separation. Define system access authorizations to support separation of duties.

criteria.description: Identify the duties of individuals requiring separation. Define system access authorizations to support separation of duties.

controls.name: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, including for specific security functions and privileged accounts.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for IAM roles

controls.name: Least Privilege Privileged Accounts
controls.description: Ensure that privileged accounts are used only for their intended purposes.

criteria.description: Instance uses least privilege for privileged accounts

controls.name: Least Privilege Privileged Functions
controls.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions.

criteria.description: Prevent non-privileged users from executing privileged functions.

controls.name: Limit Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
controls.description: Ensure unsuccessful logon attempts are limited.

criteria.description: Instance limits unsuccessful logon attempts

controls.name: System Use Notification
controls.description: Display a system use notification message with privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules before granting access to the system.

criteria.description: Display a system use notification message with privacy and security notices consistent with applicable CUI rules before granting access to the system.

controls.name: Device Lock
controls.description: Prevent system access by locking the device after a defined period of inactivity or requiring the user to lock it before leaving. Keep the device locked until the user reestablishes access with proper authentication.

criteria.description: Prevent system access by locking the device after a defined period of inactivity or requiring the user to lock it before leaving. Keep the device locked until the user reestablishes access with proper authentication.

controls.name: Session Termination
controls.description: Ensure user sessions are terminated automatically after a defined condition.

criteria.description: Instance automatically terminates user sessions after a defined condition

controls.name: Remote Access Control
controls.description: Ensure remote access sessions are monitored and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance monitors and controls remote access sessions

controls.name: Wirless Access
controls.description: Establish usage, configuration, and connection requirements for wireless access to the system. Authorize wireless access before establishing connections. Disable wireless capabilities when not in use and protect access with authentication and encryption.

criteria.description: Establish usage, configuration, and connection requirements for wireless access to the system. Authorize wireless access before establishing connections. Disable wireless capabilities when not in use and protect access with authentication and encryption.

controls.name: Access Control for Mobile Devices
controls.description: Establish usage, configuration, and connection requirements for mobile devices. Authorize mobile device connections and implement encryption to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

criteria.description: Establish usage, configuration, and connection requirements for mobile devices. Authorize mobile device connections and implement encryption to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

controls.name: Use of External Systems
controls.description: Ensure connections to external systems are verified and controlled.

criteria.description: Instance controls connections to external systems

controls.name: Publicly Accessible Content
controls.description: Train authorized individuals to ensure publicly accessible information does not contain CUI. Regularly review public content for CUI and remove it if found.

criteria.description: Train authorized individuals to ensure publicly accessible information does not contain CUI. Regularly review public content for CUI and remove it if found.

controls.name: Publicly Accessible Content
controls.description: Provide security literacy training to system users during initial onboarding and at defined intervals. Offer additional training after system changes or specific events, focusing on recognizing and reporting insider threats, social engineering, and social mining.

criteria.description: Provide security literacy training to system users during initial onboarding and at defined intervals. Offer additional training after system changes or specific events, focusing on recognizing and reporting insider threats, social engineering, and social mining.

controls.name: Publicly Accessible Content
controls.description: Provide role-based security training to personnel before authorizing access to the system or CUI, before performing duties, and at organization-defined intervals. Update training content regularly and after system changes or specific events.

criteria.description: Provide role-based security training to personnel before authorizing access to the system or CUI, before performing duties, and at organization-defined intervals. Update training content regularly and after system changes or specific events.

controls.name: Event Logging
controls.description: Ensure system audit logs and records are created and retained.

criteria.description: Instance creates and retains system audit logs

controls.name: Audit Record Content
controls.description: Ensure actions of system users can be traced.

criteria.description: Instance traces actions of individual system users

controls.name: Audit Record Generation
controls.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

criteria.description: Retain audit records for a time period consistent with the records retention policy.

controls.name: Audit Logging Failure
controls.description: Ensure alerts are generated in the event of an audit logging process failure.

criteria.description: Instance alerts in the event of audit logging process failure

controls.name: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Correlate audit record review, analysis, and reporting processes for investigation and response to indications of unlawful, unauthorized, suspicious, or unusual activity.

criteria.description: Instance correlates audit records for investigation

controls.name: Audit Record Reduction and Report Generation
controls.description: Ensure audit reduction and report generation is provided.

criteria.description: Instance provides audit reduction and report generation

controls.name: Time Synchronization
controls.description: Ensure system clocks are synchronized with an authoritative source.

criteria.description: Instance synchronizes system clocks with an authoritative source

controls.name: Protection of Audit Information
controls.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access.

criteria.description: Ensure audit information is protected from unauthorized access

controls.name: Baseline Configuration
controls.description: Develop and maintain under configuration control, a current baseline configuration of the system.

criteria.description: Develop and maintain under configuration control, a current baseline configuration of the system.

controls.name: Configuration Settings
controls.description: Provide role-based security training to personnel before authorizing access to the system or CUI, before performing duties, and at organization-defined intervals. Update training content regularly and after system changes or specific events.

criteria.description: Establish, document, and implement the following configuration settings for the system that reflect the most restrictive mode consistent with operational requirements: [Assignment: organization-defined configuration settings].

controls.name: Configuration Change Control
controls.description: Define the types of changes to the system that are configuration-controlled. Review and approve or disapprove proposed changes with explicit consideration for security impacts. Implement and document approved changes, and monitor activities related to configuration-controlled changes to the system.

criteria.description: Define the types of changes to the system that are configuration-controlled. Review and approve or disapprove proposed changes with explicit consideration for security impacts. Implement and document approved changes, and monitor activities related to configuration-controlled changes to the system.

controls.name: Impact Analyses
controls.description: Analyze changes to the system to determine potential security impacts before implementation. Verify that security requirements continue to be met after changes are implemented.

criteria.description: Analyze changes to the system to determine potential security impacts before implementation. Verify that security requirements continue to be met after changes are implemented.

controls.name: Access Restrictions for Change
controls.description: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to the system..

criteria.description: Define, document, approve, and enforce physical and logical access restrictions associated with changes to the system..

controls.name: Least Functionality
controls.description: Configure the system to provide only mission-essential capabilities.

criteria.description: Configure the system to provide only mission-essential capabilities.

controls.name: Authorized Software — Allow by Exception
controls.description: Identify software programs authorized to execute on the system.

criteria.description: Identify software programs authorized to execute on the system.

controls.name: System Component Inventory
controls.description: Develop and document an inventory of system components. Review and update the inventory at organization-defined intervals, and update it during installations, removals, and system updates.

criteria.description: Develop and document an inventory of system components. Review and update the inventory at organization-defined intervals, and update it during installations, removals, and system updates.

controls.name: Information Location
controls.description: Identify and document the location of CUI and the system components on which the information is processed and stored.

criteria.description: Identify and document the location of CUI and the system components on which the information is processed and stored.

controls.name: System and Component Configuration for High-Risk Areas
controls.description: Issue systems or components with organization-defined configurations to individuals traveling to high-risk locations. Apply organization-defined security requirements to systems or components upon return from travel.

criteria.description: Issue systems or components with organization-defined configurations to individuals traveling to high-risk locations. Apply organization-defined security requirements to systems or components upon return from travel.

controls.name: User Identification and Authentication
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate system users, associating their identification with processes acting on their behalf. Re-authenticate users under organization-defined circumstances or situations.

criteria.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate system users, associating their identification with processes acting on their behalf. Re-authenticate users under organization-defined circumstances or situations.

controls.name: Device Identification and Authentication
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate [Assignment: organization-defined devices or types of devices] before establishing a system connection.

criteria.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate [Assignment: organization-defined devices or types of devices] before establishing a system connection.

controls.name: Multi-Factor Authentication
controls.description: Use multi-factor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.

criteria.description: Use multi-factor authentication for local and network access to privileged accounts and for network access to non-privileged accounts.

controls.name: Replay-Resistant Authentication
controls.description: Implement Replay-Resistant Authentication.

criteria.description: Implement Replay-Resistant Authentication.

controls.name: Identifier Management
controls.description: Receive authorization from organizational personnel or roles to assign an individual, group, role, service, or device identifier.

criteria.description: Receive authorization from organizational personnel or roles to assign an individual, group, role, service, or device identifier.

controls.name: Password Management
controls.description: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created.

criteria.description: Enforce a minimum password complexity and change of characters when new passwords are created.

controls.name: Authentication Feedback
controls.description: Authentication Feedback.

criteria.description: Authentication Feedback.

controls.name: Authenticator Management
controls.description: Authenticator Management.

criteria.description: Authenticator Management.

controls.name: Incident Handling
controls.description: Implement an incident-handling capability that is consistent with the incident response plan and includes preparation, detection and analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery.

criteria.description: Implement an incident-handling capability that is consistent with the incident response plan and includes preparation, detection and analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery.

controls.name: Incident Monitoring, Reporting, and Response Assistance
controls.description: Track and document system security incidents. Report suspected incidents to the organizational incident response team within the organization-defined time period and to designated authorities. Provide an incident response support resource for user assistance in handling and reporting incidents.

criteria.description: Track and document system security incidents. Report suspected incidents to the organizational incident response team within the organization-defined time period and to designated authorities. Provide an incident response support resource for user assistance in handling and reporting incidents.

controls.name: Incident Response Testing
controls.description: Test the effectiveness of the incident response capability [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

criteria.description: Test the effectiveness of the incident response capability [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

controls.name: Incident Response Training
controls.description: Provide incident response training to users based on roles within organization-defined timeframes, system changes, and at regular intervals. Review and update training after major events.

criteria.description: Provide incident response training to users based on roles within organization-defined timeframes, system changes, and at regular intervals. Review and update training after major events.

controls.name: Incident Response Plan
controls.description: Develop an incident response plan that: Provides the organization with a roadmap for implementing its incident response capability.

criteria.description: Develop an incident response plan that: Provides the organization with a roadmap for implementing its incident response capability.

controls.name: Maintenance Tools
controls.description: Approve, control, and monitor the use of system maintenance tools. Check media with diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before use. Prevent the removal of maintenance equipment containing CUI by verifying, sanitizing, destroying, or retaining the equipment within the facility.

criteria.description: Approve, control, and monitor the use of system maintenance tools. Check media with diagnostic and test programs for malicious code before use. Prevent the removal of maintenance equipment containing CUI by verifying, sanitizing, destroying, or retaining the equipment within the facility.

controls.name: Nonlocal Maintenance
controls.description: Approve and monitor nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities. Implement multi-factor authentication and replay resistance for nonlocal sessions. Terminate sessions and network connections upon completion of nonlocal maintenance.

criteria.description: Approve and monitor nonlocal maintenance and diagnostic activities. Implement multi-factor authentication and replay resistance for nonlocal sessions. Terminate sessions and network connections upon completion of nonlocal maintenance.

controls.name: Maintenance Personnel
controls.description: Establish a process for maintenance personnel authorization. Maintain a list of authorized maintenance personnel or organizations. Verify that non-escorted maintenance personnel have the necessary access authorizations. Assign authorized personnel with technical competence to supervise maintenance activities when required.

criteria.description: Establish a process for maintenance personnel authorization. Maintain a list of authorized maintenance personnel or organizations. Verify that non-escorted maintenance personnel have the necessary access authorizations. Assign authorized personnel with technical competence to supervise maintenance activities when required.

controls.name: Media Storage
controls.description: Physically control and securely store system media that contain CUI.

criteria.description: Ensure physical control and secure storage of system media containing CUI.

controls.name: Media Access
controls.description: Restrict access to CUI on system media to authorized personnel or roles.

criteria.description: Verify that only authorized personnel or roles can access CUI on system media.

controls.name: Media Sanitization
controls.description: Sanitize system media that contain CUI prior to disposal, release out of organizational control, or release for reuse.

criteria.description: Ensure system media containing CUI are sanitized before disposal or reuse.

controls.name: Media Marking
controls.description: Mark system media that contain CUI to indicate distribution limitations, handling caveats, and applicable CUI markings.

criteria.description: Verify system media containing CUI are properly marked with handling and distribution information.

controls.name: Media Transport
controls.description: Protect and control system media that contain CUI during transport outside of controlled areas. Maintain accountability of system media that contain CUI during transport outside of controlled areas. Document activities associated with the transport of system media that contain CUI.

criteria.description: Ensure protection and accountability of CUI media during transport, and document transport activities.

controls.name: Media Use
controls.description: Restrict or prohibit the use of organization-defined types of system media. Prohibit the use of removable system media without an identifiable owner.

criteria.description: Enforce restrictions on system media usage, including removable media without identifiable ownership.

controls.name: System Backup — Cryptographic Protection
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality of backup information. Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized disclosure of CUI at backup storage locations.

criteria.description: Ensure backups containing CUI are protected with cryptographic mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access.

controls.name: Personnel Screening
controls.description: Screen individuals prior to authorizing access to the system. Rescreen individuals in accordance with organization-defined conditions requiring rescreening.

criteria.description: Verify that individuals are screened before being granted system access, and that rescreening is conducted as per defined conditions.

controls.name: Personnel Termination and Transfer
controls.description: When employment is terminated, disable system access within the organization-defined time period, revoke credentials, and retrieve security-related property.

criteria.description: When employment is terminated, disable system access within the organization-defined time period, revoke credentials, and retrieve security-related property.

controls.name: Physical Access Authorizations
controls.description: Develop, approve, and maintain a list of individuals with authorized access to the facility where the system resides. Issue authorization credentials and review the access list at an organization-defined frequency. Remove individuals from the list when access is no longer required.

criteria.description: Develop, approve, and maintain a list of individuals with authorized access to the facility where the system resides. Issue authorization credentials and review the access list at an organization-defined frequency. Remove individuals from the list when access is no longer required.

controls.name: Monitoring Physical Access
controls.description: Verify that physical access to the facility is monitored, and access logs are regularly reviewed and analyzed for incidents.

criteria.description: Verify that physical access to the facility is monitored, and access logs are regularly reviewed and analyzed for incidents.

controls.name: Alternate Work Site
controls.description: Determine alternate work sites allowed for use by employees. Employ the organization-defined security requirements at alternate work sites.

criteria.description: Ensure that alternate work sites are defined and meet specific security requirements set by the organization.

controls.name: Physical Access Control
controls.description: Check that physical access control measures are in place, including verification of authorizations, use of control systems, and maintenance of audit logs.

criteria.description: Check that physical access control measures are in place, including verification of authorizations, use of control systems, and maintenance of audit logs.

controls.name: Access Control for Transmission
controls.description: Control physical access to system distribution and transmission lines within organizational facilities.

criteria.description: Verify that access to system distribution and transmission lines is controlled to prevent unauthorized physical access.

controls.name: Risk Assessment
controls.description:
Assess the risk (including supply chain risk) of unauthorized disclosure resulting from the processing, storage, or transmission of CUI.
    Update risk assessments [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

criteria.description:
Assess the risk (including supply chain risk) of unauthorized disclosure resulting from the processing, storage, or transmission of CUI.
    Update risk assessments [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].

controls.name: Vulnerability Monitoring and Scanning
controls.description: Monitor and scan the system for vulnerabilities at organization-defined intervals and when new vulnerabilities are identified. Remediate vulnerabilities within organization-defined response times. Update vulnerability scans at defined intervals and when new vulnerabilities are reported.

criteria.description: Monitor and scan the system for vulnerabilities at organization-defined intervals and when new vulnerabilities are identified. Remediate vulnerabilities within organization-defined response times. Update vulnerability scans at defined intervals and when new vulnerabilities are reported.

controls.name: Risk Response
controls.description: Respond to findings from security assessments, monitoring, and audits.

criteria.description: Respond to findings from security assessments, monitoring, and audits.

controls.name: Security Assessment
controls.description: Assess the security requirements for the system and its environment of operation [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] to determine if the requirements have been satisfied.

criteria.description: Assess the security requirements for the system and its environment of operation [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] to determine if the requirements have been satisfied.

controls.name: Plan of Action and Milestones
controls.description: Develop and update a plan of action to remediate weaknesses and reduce vulnerabilities based on security assessments, audits, and monitoring.

criteria.description: Develop and update a plan of action to remediate weaknesses and reduce vulnerabilities based on security assessments, audits, and monitoring.

controls.name: Continuous Monitoring
controls.description: Develop and implement a system-level continuous monitoring strategy that includes ongoing monitoring and security assessments.

criteria.description: Develop and implement a system-level continuous monitoring strategy that includes ongoing monitoring and security assessments.

controls.name: Information Exchange
controls.description: Approve and manage CUI exchanges between systems using agreements like security or information exchange agreements, MOUs, SLAs, or NDAs. Document interface details, security requirements, and responsibilities, and review agreements regularly.

criteria.description: Approve and manage CUI exchanges between systems using agreements like security or information exchange agreements, MOUs, SLAs, or NDAs. Document interface details, security requirements, and responsibilities, and review agreements regularly.

controls.name: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Ensure communications at external and key internal interfaces are monitored and controlled, and that publicly accessible components are segregated from internal networks.

criteria.description: Ensure communications at external and key internal interfaces are monitored and controlled, and that publicly accessible components are segregated from internal networks.

controls.name: Information in Shared System Resources
controls.description: Prevent unauthorized and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.

criteria.description: Check for controls that prevent unauthorized information transfer through shared resources.

controls.name: Network Communications — Deny by Default — Allow by Exception
controls.description: Deny network communications traffic by default, and allow network communications traffic by exception.

criteria.description: Verify that network traffic is denied by default and only allowed by explicit exceptions.

controls.name: Transmission and Storage Confidentiality
controls.description: Implement cryptographic mechanisms to prevent the unauthorized disclosure of CUI during transmission and while in storage.

criteria.description: Ensure that cryptographic methods are in place to protect CUI during both transmission and storage.

controls.name: Network Disconnect
controls.description: Terminate the network connection associated with a communications session at the end of the session or after an organization-defined time period of inactivity.

criteria.description: Check for automatic termination of network connections after sessions end or periods of inactivity.

controls.name: Cryptographic Key Establishment and Management
controls.description: Establish and manage cryptographic keys in the system in accordance with organization-defined requirements for key generation, distribution, storage, access, and destruction.

criteria.description: Verify that cryptographic keys are managed according to defined policies for generation, storage, and destruction.

controls.name: Cryptographic Protection
controls.description: Implement the organization-defined types of cryptography to protect the confidentiality of CUI.

criteria.description: Ensure appropriate cryptographic methods are used to safeguard CUI.

controls.name: Collaborative Computing Devices and Applications
controls.description: Prohibit the remote activation of collaborative computing devices and applications with organization-defined exceptions. Provide an explicit indication of use to users physically present at the devices.

criteria.description: Check for controls that prohibit remote activation of devices, with clear indicators of use for physically present users.

controls.name: Mobile Code
controls.description: Define acceptable mobile code and mobile code technologies. Authorize, monitor, and control the use of mobile code.

criteria.description: Ensure the organization has policies in place for acceptable use of mobile code and monitors its implementation.

controls.name: Session Authenticity
controls.description: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.

criteria.description: Verify measures that ensure the authenticity and integrity of communications sessions.

controls.name: Flaw Remediation
controls.description: Identify, report, and correct system flaws. Install security-relevant software and firmware updates within the organization-defined time period of the release of the updates.

criteria.description: Ensure system flaws are identified, reported, and corrected. Verify that security updates are installed within the defined time frame.

controls.name: Malicious Code Protection
controls.description: Implement malicious code protection mechanisms at system entry and exit points to detect and eradicate malicious code. Update malicious code protection mechanisms as new releases are available in accordance with configuration management policies. Configure mechanisms to perform system scans and real-time scans of files from external sources.

criteria.description: Check that malicious code protection mechanisms are in place, updated regularly, and configured to scan the system at defined intervals.

controls.name: Security Alerts, Advisories, and Directives
controls.description: Receive system security alerts, advisories, and directives from external organizations on an ongoing basis. Generate and disseminate internal system security alerts, advisories, and directives, as necessary.

criteria.description: Verify that the organization receives external security alerts and disseminates internal alerts as needed.

controls.name: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor the system to detect attacks, potential attack indicators, and unauthorized connections. Identify unauthorized use of the system. Monitor inbound and outbound communications traffic to detect unusual or unauthorized activities.

criteria.description: Ensure that system monitoring is in place to detect attacks, unauthorized connections, and unusual activities.

controls.name: Information Management and Retention
controls.description: Manage and retain CUI within the system and CUI output from the system in accordance with applicable laws, Executive Orders, directives, regulations, policies, standards, guidelines, and operational requirements.

criteria.description: Verify that CUI is managed and retained in compliance with legal and operational requirements.

controls.name: Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Develop, document, and disseminate to organizational personnel or roles the policies and procedures needed to satisfy the security requirements for the protection of CUI. Review and update policies and procedures at an organization-defined frequency.

criteria.description: Ensure that security policies and procedures are developed, documented, disseminated, and regularly reviewed and updated.

controls.name: System Security Plan
controls.description: Develop a system security plan that defines the system components, identifies the information types processed, stored, and transmitted by the system, describes specific threats of concern, describes the operational environment, and provides security requirements.

criteria.description: Verify that a comprehensive system security plan is developed, maintained, and addresses system components, threats, and security requirements.

controls.name: Rules of Behavior
controls.description: Establish rules that describe the responsibilities and expected behavior for system usage and protecting CUI. Provide rules to individuals requiring system access and receive documented acknowledgments from them. Review and update rules at an organization-defined frequency.

criteria.description: Check that rules of behavior are established, disseminated, acknowledged by users, and regularly reviewed.

controls.name: Security Engineering Principles
controls.description: Apply organization-defined systems security engineering principles to the development or modification of the system and system components.

criteria.description: Ensure that security engineering principles are applied to system development and modifications.

controls.name: Unsupported System Components
controls.description: Replace system components when support is no longer available from the developer, vendor, or manufacturer. Provide risk mitigation options or alternative sources for support of components that cannot be replaced.

criteria.description: Verify that unsupported system components are replaced or that risk mitigation measures are implemented when replacement is not possible.

controls.name: External System Services
controls.description: Ensure that external service providers comply with defined security requirements, and that roles and monitoring processes are in place.

criteria.description: Ensure that external service providers comply with defined security requirements, and that roles and monitoring processes are in place.

controls.name: Supply Chain Risk Management Plan
controls.description: Ensure a supply chain risk management plan is developed, maintained, regularly reviewed, and protected from unauthorized access.

criteria.description: Ensure a supply chain risk management plan is developed, maintained, regularly reviewed, and protected from unauthorized access.

controls.name: Acquisition Strategies, Tools, and Methods
controls.description: Develop and implement acquisition strategies, contract tools, and procurement methods to identify, protect against, and mitigate supply chain risks.

criteria.description: Verify that acquisition strategies, tools, and methods are in place to mitigate supply chain risks.

controls.name: Supply Chain Requirements and Processes
controls.description: Establish a process for identifying and addressing weaknesses or deficiencies in supply chain elements and processes.

criteria.description: Ensure processes are in place to address supply chain risks and that security requirements are enforced to protect the system and its components.

controls.name: Supply Chain Risk Management Plan
controls.description: Ensure a supply chain risk management plan is developed, maintained, regularly reviewed, and protected from unauthorized access.

criteria.description: Ensure a supply chain risk management plan is developed, maintained, regularly reviewed, and protected from unauthorized access.

controls.name: Acquisition Strategies, Tools, and Methods
controls.description: Develop and implement acquisition strategies, contract tools, and procurement methods to identify, protect against, and mitigate supply chain risks.

criteria.description: Verify that acquisition strategies, tools, and methods are in place to mitigate supply chain risks.

controls.name: Supply Chain Requirements and Processes
controls.description: Establish a process for identifying and addressing weaknesses or deficiencies in supply chain elements and processes.

criteria.description: Ensure processes are in place to address supply chain risks and that security requirements are enforced to protect the system and its components.
